layout.name: Header / Navigation
layout.description: Fixed top bar with the Pneuservice logo on the left, navigation links (Servizi, Chi Siamo, Orari, Contatti) centered or right-aligned, and a prominent phone CTA button. On mobile, collapses to a hamburger menu.

layout.name: Hero Section
layout.description: Full-width hero with a dark overlay on an automotive/tire background image. Main headline: 'Il vostro specialista di pneumatici dal 1983'. Subheadline emphasizing reliability and professionalism. Two CTA buttons: 'Chiamaci ora' (phone link) and 'I nostri servizi' (scroll anchor). Conveys trust and expertise immediately.

layout.name: Services Section
layout.description: Grid of service cards (3 columns desktop, 2 tablet, 1 mobile) showcasing the full range: cambio pneumatici, deposito pneumatici, equilibratura, convergenza, lavaggio ruote, pulizia cerchi, vendita cerchi, controllo valvole e pressione, riparazione, catene da neve, scooter/auto di cortesia. Each card has an icon, title, and short description.

layout.name: About / Chi Siamo Section
layout.description: Two-column layout (image left, text right on desktop; stacked on mobile). Highlights 40+ years of experience since 1983, team expertise, and customer trust. Uses one of the provided business images.

layout.name: Gallery Section
layout.description: Responsive image gallery showcasing the workshop, equipment, and team using the provided business images. Displays as a grid (3 columns desktop, 2 tablet, 1 mobile) with lightbox functionality on click.

layout.name: Opening Hours Section
layout.description: Clean table or card layout showing weekly hours. Monday–Friday 08:00–12:00 / 13:30–18:00 and Saturday 08:00–12:00. Highlights current open/closed status dynamically. Includes a note about the midday break.

layout.name: Location / Contact Section
layout.description: Two-column layout: left side shows contact details (address, phone, email) with clickable links; right side embeds an interactive map centered on coordinates 45.856843, 8.982956. No contact form per the brief—direct contact info only.

layout.name: Footer
layout.description: Dark background footer with business name, address, phone, email, opening hours summary, and copyright notice. Quick navigation links repeated for accessibility.

layout.name: Draft Preview Modal
layout.description: An overlay modal shown on page load indicating this is a draft/preview version of the website, as specified in the brief. Dismissible with a button.

components.name: Navbar
components.purpose: Responsive fixed navigation bar with logo, nav links (Servizi, Chi Siamo, Orari, Contatti), and a phone CTA. Collapses to hamburger on mobile with smooth slide-in menu.

components.name: HeroSection
components.purpose: Full-width banner with background image, dark gradient overlay, headline text, subtext, and two CTA buttons. Sets the visual tone for the site.

components.name: ServiceCard
components.purpose: Reusable card component displaying a service icon, title, and brief description. Used in the Services grid. Hover effect with subtle elevation or border color change.

components.name: SectionHeading
components.purpose: Consistent section title component with a heading, optional subtitle, and a decorative accent underline in the secondary color. Used to introduce each major section.

components.name: AboutBlock
components.purpose: Two-column content block with an image on one side and text on the other. Used for the Chi Siamo section to tell the company story.

components.name: ImageGallery
components.purpose: Responsive grid gallery displaying workshop photos. Supports lightbox/modal view on image click for full-size viewing.

components.name: OpeningHoursTable
components.purpose: Structured table or card list showing daily opening hours. Visually distinguishes weekdays from Saturday. Can highlight today's hours.

components.name: ContactInfo
components.purpose: Displays address, phone (tel: link), and email (mailto: link) with icons. All contact details are clickable for mobile usability.

components.name: MapEmbed
components.purpose: Embedded interactive map (e.g., Google Maps or OpenStreetMap) centered on the business coordinates (45.856843, 8.982956) with a pin marker.

components.name: Footer
components.purpose: Site-wide footer with business info summary, quick links, and copyright. Dark themed to contrast with the light page background.

components.name: DraftModal
components.purpose: Overlay modal displayed on page load to indicate the site is a draft preview. Contains a message and a dismiss button.

components.name: CTAButton
components.purpose: Reusable call-to-action button with primary and secondary variants. Used for phone links, scroll-to-section actions, and other interactive elements.

featureImplementations.details: All UI text, headings, labels, and content rendered in Italian. HTML lang attribute set to 'it'. Includes proper Italian formatting for phone numbers and addresses.
No contact form. Phone number displayed as a clickable tel: link. Email as a clickable mailto: link. Address linked to map directions. All prominent and accessible.
On initial page load, a centered modal overlay appears with a message like 'Anteprima del sito — Questa è una bozza del sito web.' and a dismiss button. Uses a semi-transparent backdrop.

Mobile-first approach. Breakpoints at 640px (sm), 768px (md), 1024px (lg). Navigation collapses to hamburger. Service grid adjusts columns. Two-column sections stack vertically. Touch-friendly tap targets (min 44px).
Navbar links use smooth scrolling to anchor sections. Active section highlighted in the nav as user scrolls. Offset accounts for fixed header height.
JavaScript checks current day/time against opening hours and displays a green 'Aperto' or red 'Chiuso' badge in the header or opening hours section.
Schema.org LocalBusiness JSON-LD markup with business name, address, phone, email, coordinates, opening hours, and logo. Meta tags for description and Open Graph.
Lazy loading for gallery images. Optimized font loading with font-display: swap. Minimal CSS and JS. Compressed assets where possible.

additionalNotes: The site targets a local Swiss-Italian audience in Ticino. The design should feel professional, trustworthy, and automotive-industry appropriate — clean lines, bold typography, and a strong color palette of deep blue (trust/reliability), red (energy/Swiss identity), and amber accents (attention/warmth). Since the business has operated since 1983, the design should convey established credibility without feeling outdated. All content in Italian. The single-page layout ensures fast load times and simple navigation for a local service business. The URL slug is 'pneuservice'.
